solution_line_template: Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is {fingers}-{fewer_trumpets}=<<{fingers}-{fewer_trumpets}={num_trumpets}>>{num_trumpets} trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is {hands}+{more_guitars}=<<{hands}+{more_guitars}={num_guitars}>>{num_guitars} guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is {more_trombones}+{heads}=<<{more_trombones}+{heads}={num_trombones}>>{num_trombones} trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is {num_guitars}-{fewer_french_horn}=<<{num_guitars}-{fewer_french_horn}={num_french_horns}>>{num_french_horns} French horns.
